intervention_title: Finance, Benefit and Debt Services in Stockport
short_description: This is a Big Life Group service delivered by Foundation 92 in Stockport

activities.activity: Individual sessions delivered on a 1:1 basis covering budgeting, debt management, advice and guidance
Individual sessions delivered on a 1:1 basis covering benefits and better of calculations. Advocacy in lodging appeals and advice on how to avoid incurring sanctions.
Support and advocacy to open bank accounts and access to financial services and adhere to a debt management plan. 1:1 support to support individual with financial literacy.
